text: James Richard Wright (born November 22, 1958) is a former professional baseball pitcher. He pitched parts of five seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB). Wright made his MLB debut for the Los Angeles Dodgers on July 28, 1982. In August 1983, the Dodgers traded Wright and Dave Stewart to the Texas Rangers for Rick Honeycutt. Wright pitched for the Rangers through 1986. ==References== ==External links== Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Texas Rangers players Category:San Antonio Dodgers players Category:Albuquerque Dukes players Category:Oklahoma City 89ers players Category:Denver Zephyrs players Category:Toledo Mud Hens players Category:Texas Longhorns baseball players Category:Baseball players from Texas Category:1958 births Category:Living people
title: Ricky Wright (baseball)
